channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Finery London Sale
channel.desc: Update your summer wardrobe at an incredible price with our sale on Finery London fashion. Showcasing stunning prints, beautiful designs and so much more, find a Finery bargain right here.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Sale from 50% Off
channel.desc: This summer, save a sparkling 50% off Diamonique jewellery in our special sale! From radiant rings to beautiful bracelets, adorn yourself in pieces to let you shine, all at incredible prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: QVC Selection
channel.desc: A great time to fill up your wardrobe with amazing bargains - from this year's finest fashions to tried-and-tested classics.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sleepwear
channel.desc: Update your nightwear with our fabulous selection from some top brands. From comfy pyjamas and soft, stylish nightdresses to slouchy robes and more, we've got you covered.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen Sale
channel.desc: Don't miss out on the Masai Copenhagen sale! Now is the perfect opportunity to snap up on-trend, comfortable styles. You can enliven your wardrobe for the whole season.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Radley London
channel.desc: Radley fashion accessories provide an aspirational mix of style, attention to detail and desirability, offering designs for every occasion that make you look and feel fabulous.
